attributes.title: ✨Donald Trump is a white suprematist. If you vote for him again you are a white suprematist.✨
attributes.review: Our amazing Cheeto🥕🥕 pëdöphïlë of a president has done it again! He messed up. This app is super glitchy AND DOES NOT WORK!!! Some recommendations I have are arresting the cops (🐷) who kílléd Breonna Taylor, defunding the police (🐷), and not run for president. This app is a huge disappointment, and I hate it and the lying, cheating, motherfcker who is our president. No cap. But we do be simping for Barron 🥵✨ Yeah thats another thing: spell your own sons name right you d!ckwad 🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕BLACK LIVES MATTER

first of all, this app is the slowest thing I’ve ever had. every time I go to open it it slows my whole phone and I have to close everything down. second, the quality of it in general is horrible. third, with the app being slow it took FOREVER for me to download and I have very fast internet. All my other apps download fine but this app took about an hour to fully download. Never get this app, If I could give it a zero star I would.

attributes.title: my cat die
attributes.review: i went on the app and to see why trump should be President again while i was in the app the app glitch so much and then my phone stop working and out of no where my car dead let me just say my cat was in really good health and he stated feeling bad when i download it this app and then out of no where my house started to burn down and this was all happening while i had this app maybe it’s a sign not to let the orange small 🍤 not be president again🥰

attributes.title: Ratchet
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. Right away I opened the app and remembered I have an allergy to oranges, I wouldn’t think it would be a problem but I got hives all over and threw up all over my phone causing it to sizzle and burn, it hurt my eyes to even look at the orange giant. It was as bad as when I had an allergic reaction to goldfish since they are orange ish also expect bunker boy did not smile back. Absolutely ratchet app, whole experience gave me nightmares for week, it was astronomically traumatizing. do not recommend

attributes.title: Paranormal Things
attributes.review:
After I got this app, I was so excited to see what MY president was doing. But then, that night, the cross that I have in my room, flipped upside down. I heard it. It was absolutely terrifying.

 My phone started glitching every time I opened the app. As soon as my phone glitched, my screen would go black, and my lights would switch off in my house. 

I personally, as a Christian, think someone cursed this app, and it needs to be immediately removed off the app store.

attributes.title: Not Satisfactory in any way
attributes.review: I was looking for reasons that trump should be in office again in 2020, and came across this app.  I downloaded it to see if there would be any reasons.  It made me put it all of my personal information to let me see the reasons why he should be re-elected.  But I found out that the app SOLD my private information.  I will never use this again and you shouldn’t either if you don’t want your information stolen and sold.

attributes.title: Don’t download 🤮🙄

attributes.title: VERY SAD
attributes.review: So I opened the app to see an 🍊. My cat happened to be next to me and looking right at my phone! My cat got so scared of the sad, strange 🍊that she teleported to a railroad! A train was coming right then and my cat flailed the train over! Many people didn’t make the tragic accident. My cat then ran away and we had to get the roaches to find the cat. The only way we could get the roaches to help was by letting them live in our house! Thanks to this app my cat is on the run, we have to live with ROACHES, AND MANY PEOPLE DIED! SMH 🤦‍♀️

attributes.title: MY TOES GOT CHOPPED OFF
attributes.review: I was so excited to download the app but then the app punched me in the face! It also gave me horrible gas. I could not stop passing gas for two weeks after downloading this disgusting orange owned app. NOT TO MENTION that my dog fell in LAVA because of this app. So if you LOVE YOUR DOGS AND OTHER PETS, don’t even bother downloading this app❤️ This app also put a virus into my phone causing it to delete every singe app that I have downloaded👁👄👁 chile anyway so the point is don’t elect the large orange Cheeto again and instead vote for biden✨

attributes.title: WORST APP IT KILLED MY HERMIT CRAB
attributes.review: This is the worst Trump app I have ever used!! I used to love Trump, first off this app took 2 years to download, next, It showed me a picture of the president himself, then played really creepy music and told me to vote for Biden instead which I’m not doing. So then the next day after having this app in my home screen I found my hermit crab dead, with a note on it that said that Donald trump did it 🥺. This is a true story so you need to not download or else it will kill your pets and family
